name: Sisyph: A rewind story
description:
Sisyph: A rewind story is a small platform made for Brackeys Jam 2020.2.

Sisyph is a robot created by Jeff Bones for his experiment concerning the level of stress manageable by a robot.

Controls:

Keyboard:

  • Move: WASD or Arrow keys;
  • Jump: Space or Arrow Keys;
  • Dash: Key E;

Controller:

  • Move: X Axis;
  • Jump: A
  • Dash: RT or Y;

Credits:

This game is made using Godot 3.2.2 and all assets are made by me.

Music:

Retro Games Music and Synthwave Game Boy by Infraction.
